messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: ATTN BLOGGERS
messages.msgSnippet: Yeah, a blog is pretty much a public, online journal, a soapbox, etc. I want to do it because it might be more fun--kind of like using crayons instead of a
messages.messageBody:
Yeah, a blog is pretty much a public, online journal, a soapbox, etc.

I want to do it because it might be more fun--kind of like using crayons instead of a pencil. Plus, I like to keep up with the technology.

--danielle
I have a question. What's the purpose of a blog though? It must be to share
with others right? Otherwise you could just write a journal.

The last few months I've been writing what the kids have been doing and
other thoughts ...when I feel like it,in no specific order . I call it December
ramblings , January ramblings, etc and just keep it saved to my computer.
So would that be a Blog if I put it on a Blog hoster?

~Marcia

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: ATTN BLOGGERS
messages.msgSnippet: Yup! That would be a Blog! People write about all sorts of things, and it s all interesting to me - what people are doing and thinking, the various opinions on
messages.messageBody:
Yup! That would be a Blog! People write about all sorts of things, and it's all interesting to me - what people are doing and thinking, the various opinions on subjects.

MamaBeth

MarSi77@... wrote:

> I've been toying with setting up an unschooling blog as a fun way to write
> about some of our unschooling days. Early on, I kept a journal, but that was
> tedious--maybe because I tried to do it everyday.
>
> With a blog, I could just write up the days that stick out, when we did
> really cool things, or really comfortable things, or whatever. Then I could print
> it out to keep and to use for my review.

I have a question. What's the purpose of a blog though? It must be to share
with others right? Otherwise you could just write a journal.

The last few months I've been writing what the kids have been doing and
other thoughts ...when I feel like it,in no specific order . I call it December
ramblings , January ramblings, etc and just keep it saved to my computer.
So would that be a Blog if I put it on a Blog hoster?

~Marcia
